welcome: Select a deck for studying, or upload a new deck by clicking "Upload a deck"
keyWrong: You wrote something, but the bot did not understand you. Please use the buttons below
addDeck: Upload the deck in *.apkg format (download decks here: https://ankiweb.net/shared/decks)
uploadError: There was an error uploading the deck
deckUploadQuestionChoose:
Select which field will be used as the question
The following shows what fields the deck contains and what is contained in those fields
deckUploadAnswerChoose: Select which field will be used as the answer
deckAddSuccess: The deck has been successfully added
endStudy:
That's it
Don't forget to repeat the deck tomorrow
deckStudied: Everything's been studied for today, come back tomorrow.
decksSettings: Select the deck you want to customize
buttonChangeFields: 🖊️ Change the fields of the deck
choosedDeckSettings: You're in the deck settings under the name:
fieldsChooseSuccess: The deck settings have been successfully updated
removeDeckSure: Are you sure you want to remove the deck?
removeSuccess: The deck has been successfully removed
